company.description: Together AI is a research-driven AI company that empowers developers and researchers to train, fine-tune, and deploy generative AI models. They contribute leading open-source research, models, and datasets to advance the frontier of AI.

recent_products: Fastest inference for real-time voice AI agents

events.title: Announcing the Together AI Startup Accelerator, purpose-built for AI Native Apps
events.description: Together AI announces the launch of a new startup accelerator designed specifically for AI Native applications.

events.title: Announcing General Availability of Together Instant Clusters, offering ready to use, self-service NVIDIA GPUs
events.description: Together AI announces the general availability of Together Instant Clusters for self-service GPU access.

events.title: Fine-Tuning Platform Upgrades: Larger Models, Longer Contexts, Enhanced Hugging Face Integrations
events.description: Together AI announces upgrades to their fine-tuning platform, enhancing model capabilities and integrations.

events.title: Together AI Delivers Top Speeds for DeepSeek-R1-0528 Inference on NVIDIA Blackwell
events.description: Together AI announces top inference speeds for their DeepSeek model using NVIDIA Blackwell technology.

events.title: Salesforce, Zoom, InVideo Train Faster with Together AI Turbocharged with NVIDIA Blackwell
events.description: Together AI announces collaboration with prominent companies to enhance AI training using NVIDIA technology.

events.title: Together AI Announces $305M Series B to Scale AI Acceleration Cloud for Open Source and Enterprise AI
events.description: Together AI announces a $305 million Series B funding round for scaling their AI acceleration cloud services.

events.title: Together AI welcomes Mahadev Konar as SVP for Infrastructure Engineering
events.description: Mahadev Konar joins Together AI as Senior Vice President for Infrastructure Engineering to enhance technical leadership.

events.title: Expanding Together AI Model Library into multimedia generation with 40+ new image and video models
events.description: Together AI expands its model library to include over 40 new models for image and video generation.

events.title: Dynamic AI agent testing for the real world with Collinear Simulations and Together Evals
events.description: Together AI announces a new product for testing AI agents in real-world scenarios using Collinear Simulations.

events.title: Together Evaluations: Benchmark Models for Your Tasks
events.description: Together AI launches a new evaluation tool to benchmark AI models for specific tasks.
